definition: to research/to check/to investigate/to examine/to refer to/to look up (e.g. a word in a dictionary)
Slovakia/Slovak/abbr. for 斯洛伐克[Si1 luo4 fa2 ke4]
to stop/to pause/to arrange/to lay out/to kowtow/to stamp (one's foot)/at once/classifier for meals, beatings, scoldings etc: time, bout, spell, meal

sentences.english: The company will perform the work in Charleston.
sentences.chinese: 該公司將在查爾斯頓進行工作。

sentences.english: The side-by-side is the first step to master when dancing the Charleston.
sentences.chinese: 側的側是第一步跳舞時掌握的查爾斯頓。

sentences.english: But he sent two men separately to Charleston to get him information on the situation there.
sentences.chinese: 但他先後派遣兩人到查爾斯頓，去了解那裏的情況。

sentences.english: Buick Charleston railroad, and Chevrolet and GMC.
sentences.chinese: 阿鐵查爾斯頓別克，雪佛蘭，GMC。

sentences.english: Scholtens of the College of Charleston.
sentences.chinese: 他是查爾斯頓學院的生物學家史高頓。

sentences.english: Scarlett said Cathleen was home from Charleston.
sentences.chinese: 思嘉說過凱瑟已經從查爾斯頓回來了。
這輛車是進到我們在查爾斯頓的車場的。

sentences.english: The work will be performed in Charleston and at other locations worldwide.
sentences.chinese: 該項工作將在查爾斯頓和世界其他地方進行。

sentences.english: I don’t want to go to Charleston or have a house or marry the twins.
sentences.chinese: 我不去查爾斯頓，也不要什麼房子，或同雙胞胎結婚。
